channel.title: ::pure command for 317 [pi] anyone got?

item.title: ::pure command for 317 [pi] anyone got?
item.dc:creator: @CoD4Erik CoD4Erik
item.description:
@CoD4Erik wrote:

I have 3 pure commands. A command for just a plain ol’ pure, one for a hybrid, (no attack or strength) and one for a zerker. Here they are.
Pure:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure") && playerRights >= 1) { addSkillXP(14000000, 0); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(14000000, 4); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); }

Hybrid:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("hybrid") && playerRights >= 1) { addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(14000000, 4); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); }

Zerker:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("zerkerpure") && playerRights >= 1) { addSkillXP(14000000, 0); addSkillXP(14000000, 1); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(14000000, 4); addSkillXP(14000000, 5); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); }

Hope I helped!

Read full topic

item.title: ::pure command for 317 [pi] anyone got?

@emtrescue wrote:

immature morons

[code] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“pure”) {
int i = 0;
c.getPA().addSkillXP((15000000), 0);
c.getPA().addSkillXP((15000000), 2);
c.getPA().addSkillXP((15000000), 3);
c.getPA().addSkillXP((15000000), 4);
c.getPA().addSkillXP((15000000), 6);
c.playerXP[3] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5;
c.playerLevel[3] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(3);

		}[/code]
